name: document-management-system
description: The system manages documents, users and user roles. Each document defines access rights; the document defines which roles can access it. Also, each document specifies the date it was published.

scripts.db-set: dropdb documentManager && createdb documentManager && psql -f schema.sql documentManager
scripts.test: npm run seed && rm -rf coverage/ && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec
